text: The Sixth of July () is a 1968 Soviet drama movie directed by Yuli Karasik.Революцию достали с полокШЕСТОЕ ИЮЛЯ It stars Alla Demidova, Ivan Solovyov, and Armen Dzhigarkhanyan. == Actors == * Alla Demidova as Maria Spiridonova * Ivan Solovyov as Andrei Kolegayev * Armen Dzhigarkhanyan as Prosh Proshian * Vyacheslav Shalevich as Yakov Blumkin * Andrey Kryukov as Boris Kamkov * Grigory Ostrin as Donat Cherepanov == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Russian drama movies Category:1968 drama movies Category:1960s historical movies Category:Soviet drama movies
title: The Sixth of July
